thread.title: Biomimic Tree – IFAD is Pushing Agriculture Up the Agenda @COP23
thread.title_full: Biomimic Tree – IFAD is Pushing Agriculture Up the Agenda @COP23 - One News Page

posts.author: onenewspage.com
posts.title: Biomimic Tree – IFAD is Pushing Agriculture Up the Agenda @COP23
posts.text:
The International Fund for Agricultural Development (IFAD), a UN agency that is helping smallholder farmers adapt to and mitigate climate change, sponsored British artist Silas Birtwistle Biomimic Tree at the United Nations' Climate Summit (UNFCCC COP23) in Bonn, Germany.

Bonn, Germany (PRWEB) November 07, 2017

Drawing attention to the impact that climate change is having on rural communities in developing countries, British artist Silas Birtwistle unveiled his Biomimic Tree at the United Nations' Climate Summit (UNFCCC COP23) in Bonn, Germany.

Sponsored by the International Fund for Agricultural Development (IFAD), a UN agency that is helping smallholder farmers adapt to and mitigate climate change, the installation uses recycled plastic to depict a tree which only fully comes alive when water runs through it.

"At the bottom of the tree there is a small pump which takes water through a series of clear pipes to fruit and birds, which all gently move, turn, spin and chatter in response," said Silas Birtwistle. "Every five minutes, the pump will activate and the tree will come to life, water will trickle, the birds will sing and the leaves will flutter."

This sculpture highlights the dependence of all living things on a functioning healthy ecosystem. The tree provides food and a home to animals and birds. It also offers shelter from wind and shade from sun, allowing crops to thrive and feed families. Trees also stop topsoil erosion in arid areas and can act as extremely effective carbon sinks.

"The water running through the tree highlights the increasing importance of this critical resource due to climate change," said IFAD's Environment and Climate Division Director, Margarita Astralaga. "When the water is running the tree comes to life, when the water stops the tree comes to a stop, or dies."

She added, "Right now climate change issues such as water scarcity and erratic weather patterns are adversely affecting smallholder farmers in the developing world. But IFAD-led solutions are empowering them to combat and overcome these issues. "

In its new Strategic Framework IFAD has renewed its commitment to enhancing biodiversity alongside increasing agricultural productivity and lowering greenhouse gas emissions from agriculture while contributing to poverty reduction.

"The sculpture highlights IFAD's restoration efforts which focuses on planting trees on degraded lands to stop soil erosion, form a barrier to desertification and provide shelter to crops," added Birtwistle.

In the Sahel region of Africa IFAD has already rehabilitated almost 300,000 hectares. For example, in Niger IFAD regenerated 100,000 hectares by protecting land from overgrazing and deforestation and replanting trees. Once barren land now has approximately 50 trees per hectare. In total IFAD's agroforestry and related activities have contributed to the removal of over 58,000 tons of carbon dioxide from the atmosphere.

"We wanted negotiators at UNFCCC COP23 to see for themselves the beauty of sustainable climate resilient agriculture and the crucial role this plays in the wellbeing of rural communities,” said Birtwistle

“Farmers have to work with nature to create a truly sustainable food secure future,” said Astralaga. “Working with Silas, exhibiting this amazing Biomimic Tree, we show the very real challenge of climate change and environmental sustainability for smallholder farmers in developing countries.''

IFAD’s investments, including the Adaptation for Smallholder Agriculture Programme (ASAP), help farmers in a variety of ways, from installing weather forecast systems, to introducing new drought resistant crop varieties, as well as setting up farmer field schools where knowledge and new climate smart agriculture techniques can be demonstrated and disseminated.

Note to editors:
Margarita Astralaga, Director, Environment and Climate and Silas Birtwhistle, are available for media interviews.

About the artist
Silas was born in Shaftesbury, Dorset, in 1963. He attended Portree High School, Isle of Skye, Scotland. He went on to study for a BA Hons in English/History and an MA in Furniture Design. He started making furniture in 1990’s and soon after, exclusively with driftwood. He currently lives and works in Somerset, England. http://www.silasbirtwistle.com/

IFAD invests in rural people, empowering them to reduce poverty, increase food security, improve nutrition and strengthen resilience. Since 1978, we have provided about US$18 billion in grants and low-interest loans to projects that have reached some 462 million people. IFAD is an international financial institution and a specialized United Nations agency based in Rome – the UN’s food and agriculture hub. For more information visit http://www.ifad.org

posts.author: dpuser_3508372874
posts.text:
关于51talk怎么收费，抛开那句宣传语来讲，其实价格也并不算太贵。我真正想要吐槽的是上课形式的约束性，月卡每天强制必须上一节课，并且每月只能请一次假。这个就不是很灵活了，要是真有什么急事而之前又请过一次假的话，就只能浪费一节课了。 51talk一年收费价格是多少，网上还是能够查询到51talk的详细收费价格的，是根据次卡、包月、无限卡这三种不同的套餐来收取费用，其中，次卡可以自由预约，一天可约多节课；包月可以每天都可以上课；无限卡则可以不限堂数、地点、时间、课时学习。 次卡60次、120次，240次和480次价格分别为1988元、3388元、5588元和9688元 包月6个月、12个月和24个月价格分为别3666元、5666元和8866元； 无限卡：3个月无限量小班课+60堂外教1对1课=3199元； 6个月无限量小班课+120堂外教1对1课=5399元； 12个月无限量小班课+240堂外教1对1课=9699元； 24个月无限量小班课+480堂外教1对1课=17799元。 51talk无忧英语李娜代言的，现在是贾乃亮，几乎在很多地方你都能看到他们的15元一节课的广告宣传，长期买的话15块钱一节课也是可以达到的，三个月、半年的话就不是这个价格了。 下面来说下Hitalk英语收费： 之所以说Hitalk英语的课程有点贵，是因为Hitalk英语所有课程都没有低于1万的，就算是课时只有80课时，也是一万多，对于练口语来说，这个课程是远远不够的，时间多可能一两个月就能学完，因为时间只有25分钟。 Hitalk外教1对1收费标准 Hitalk外教1对1商务口语80课时套餐 11680元 Hitalk外教1对1商务口语150课时套餐 18150元 Hitalk外教1对1商务口语360课时套餐 37080元 Hitalk外教1对1商务口语300课时套餐 31800元 Hitalk外教1对1商务口语240课时套餐 26880元 Hitalk外教1对1商务口语180课时套餐 21240元
由hitalk英语的收费标准中可以看出，最低套餐收费要上万块，另平均每节课收费145元。这个价格在在线英语收费中算中上水平的。相对一些平价的机构来讲，hitalk英语的收费并不占优势。如果在乎性价比，建议货比三家，我们找培训机构学习，无非在乎的就两点： 一、教学效果 二、性价比 我觉得立刻说的性价比还是不错的，一年才6988，外教定制学习计划，上课前还有短信提醒，服务非常不错，值得推荐！！如果买课的话，还会赠送一些课时，非常划算，性价比超高。 免费体验网址： http://s.dianping.com.xmfiish.com/topic/05

thread.title: Predators visit Jackets with major additon coming soon (Nov 07, 2017) | FOX Sports
thread.title_full: Predators visit Jackets with major additon coming soon (Nov 07, 2017) | FOX Sports

posts.author: Nov
posts.title: Predators visit Jackets with major additon coming soon (Nov 07, 2017) | FOX Sports
posts.text:
Predators visit Jackets with major additon coming soon (Nov 07, 2017) Nov 7, 2017 at 3:38a ET 0Shares 
COLUMBUS, Ohio — The Nashville Predators will play their first game on Tuesday night since landing center Kyle Turris in a blockbuster deal that involved the Ottawa Senators and Colorado Avalanche. 
Whether Turris makes his Predators debut against the Columbus Blue Jackets at Nationwide Arena was still to be determined as of Monday night while the team worked out immigration issues. 
It is more likely that Turris will be available for a home game on Saturday against the Pittsburgh Penguins. Article continues below ... 
“I’m not sure how long the immigration process is going to take,” Turris said. “I’ll definitely be in Nashville by middle of this week for sure and hopefully get a few practices in before the game on Saturday.” 
In the meantime, the Predators (7-5-2) are in Columbus for the first meeting of the season between the longtime rivals. Nashville last played on Saturday night in Los Angeles, coming away with a 4-3 overtime victory over the Kings. The Tuesday game wraps up a four-game road trip. 
On Sunday, Nashville general manager David Poile pulled off a major coup that strengthens the Predators up the middle for years to come with the addition of Turris as part of a three-team trade. The other major player in the deal was forward Matt Duchene, who went from the Avalanche to the Senators. 
Colorado received goaltender Andrew Hammond, a protected first-round pick in the 2018 NHL draft, a third-round pick in 2019 and forward Shane Bowers from Ottawa. The Predators shipped young defenseman Samuel Girard, forward Vladislav Kamenev and a second-round pick in the 2018 draft to the Avalanche. 
Before the trade was completed Turris signed a six-year, $36 million deal with the Predators through 2022-23. His contract was set to expire at the end of this season. 
The acquisition of Turris was widely acclaimed throughout the league. He will add to a talented corps of forwards that includes Ryan Johansen, Viktor Arvidsson, Calle Jornkrok, Filip Forsberg, Nick Bonino, Kevin Fiala, Colton Sissons and Frederick Gaudreau. 
“Since the franchise started 20 years ago, our skill and depth at the center position has always been something that we’ve coveted and continually searched for,” Poile said. “With the acquisition of Kyle Turris, we are now as skilled and as deep at the center position as we ever have been.” 
Turris, who had three goals and nine points in 11 games for the Senators this season, is expected to center the second line behind Johansen and bump Bonino to the middle of the third line. 
The 28-year-old Turris scored a career-high 27 goals during the 2016-17 regular season and helped the Senators reach the Eastern Conference finals with four goals and 10 points in the playoffs. In seven years with Ottawa, he led the team in goals with 117 and was second in points with 274. 
Another Nashville newcomer definitely will be in Columbus for the Tuesday night game. Veteran forward Scott Hartnell, who joined the Predators in the offseason after the Blue Jackets decided not to re-sign him, has four goals and seven points in 14 games for Nashville this season. 
The Blue Jackets (9-5-1) limped home from the second game of a back-to-back after a 5-3 loss to the New York Rangers on Monday night at Madison Square Garden. They blew two leads and gave up three power-play goals in the third period. 
“Tough night for the kill,” Blue Jackets center Brandon Dubinsky said. “We need to get back to work and try to have a short memory here. Obviously, we’re not happy with it. It sunk us tonight.” 
The Blue Jackets completed a three-game road trip with a 1-1-1 record, but the bigger issue is mounting injuries. The latest casualty is gritty forward Matt Calvert, who is out three to four weeks with an upper-body injury sustained during the Saturday night game against the Tampa Bay Lightning. 
Calvert’s absence was noticeable on the power play against the Rangers. Third-period penalties also hurt. 
“Couldn’t kill one off,” Blue Jackets coach John Tortorella said. “When you take stupid penalties, you don’t kill them off. We’re a dumb hockey team tonight. We (threw) one away.”

thread.section_title: A Agonia de Prometeu

posts.author: paulo.oliveira.mello (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.text:
Todos têm uma solução para a violência no Rio, mas... 
Alvaro Costa e Silva - FSP 
RIO DE JANEIRO - Havia —e em certas cabeças ainda há— o truísmo segundo o qual aquele que resolvesse o problema da violência no Rio podia se considerar o futuro presidente. 
O esquema criminoso armado pelo ex-governador Sérgio Cabral previa esse tipo de trampolim político. (Imagine só do que escapamos.) Entre outras coisas, deu errado porque Cabral, que só pensava em meter dinheiro no próprio bolso, não prosseguiu com as UPPs (Unidades de Polícia Pacificadora). Uma segunda fase do projeto —mais voltada para o lado social— garantiria à população das áreas de risco acesso à educação, saúde, saneamento, mobilidade, serviços básicos. 
Pois o governo federal, de uma hora para outra, resolveu arrumar uma solução para o caos carioca. Mal escapou da denúncia por obstrução da Justiça e organização criminosa , Michel Temer promete combater o crime organizado e o narcotráfico e aumentar a vigilância nas fronteiras. Cabe perguntar por que não se mexeu antes. Talvez porque só agora o marqueteiro Elsinho Mouco tenha lhe garantido um milagre ainda maior: elevar a popularidade do presidente de 3% para 50% em seis meses. Só mesmo acabando com a violência no Rio. Ou tirando o Rio do mapa. 
É difícil pôr panos quentes, como quer o governo, nas declarações de Torquato Jardim sobre os comandantes da PM "sócios do crime". Como dizem no país da máfia, "se non è vero... è ben trovato". 
Políticos fluminenses reagiram no estilo garganta, acusando o ministro da Justiça de ofender "a honra" do Estado e blá-blá-blá. Logo em seguida, o comando da Polícia Militar exonerou seis oficiais da Corregedoria. A equipe estava batendo recordes: de junho a setembro, foram presos 62 PMs —um aumento de 588% no número de prisões em comparação ao trimestre anterior. O governador Pezão nem pigarreou para dar alguma explicação.

thread.title: Meek Mill: Er geht für zwei Jahre ins Gefängnis | GALA.de
thread.title_full: Meek Mill: Er geht für zwei Jahre ins Gefängnis | GALA.de

posts.title: Meek Mill: Er geht für zwei Jahre ins Gefängnis | GALA.de
posts.text:
Nicki Minaj (34) gegen seine Bewährungsauflagen verstoßen hat, wie "Philly.com" berichtet. 
Bereits zweimal soll Mill - der eigentlich Robert Rihmeek Williams heißt - in diesem Jahr festgenommen worden sein. Die Richterin erklärte nun die Gefängnisstrafe, die zwischen zwei und vier Jahren liegt, damit, dass sie dem Rapper bereits zahlreiche Chancen gegeben habe. Jetzt sei sie fertig mit ihm. Laut "Philly.com" wurde Mill direkt nach der Verhandlung in Handschellen abgeführt. Sein Anwalt wolle gegen das Urteil vorgehen, heißt es. 
Nicht das erste Mal im Gefängnis 
Erst im März war Mill nach einer handfesten Auseinandersetzung mit einem Fan an einem Flughafen festgenommen worden. Zuletzt stellte ihn die Polizei nach einer rücksichtslosen und gefährlichen Motorradfahrt durch New York unter Arrest. Der Star war bereits für acht Monate im Gefängnis und hatte eine fünfjährige Bewährungsstrafe: 2009 stand er vor Gericht, damals ging es um Waffen und Drogen. 2015 soll er seine Bewährungsauflagen ebenfalls verletzt haben, damals war er laut "TMZ" noch mit Hausarrest davongekommen. © SpotOnNews

posts.author: Editor Web RC
posts.title: Horóscopos
posts.text:
ARIES 
21 marzo-20 abril 
Cuando alguna persona solicite tu ayuda, bríndala en forma generosa, así les permites que te conozcan y entiendan que lo único que deseas es su amistad. 
TAURO Publicidad 
21 abril-20 mayo 
Tus relaciones son muy importantes, porque deseas sinceramente tener a alguien permanentemente con quien puedas convivir. 
GÉMINIS 
21 mayo-21 junio 
A la mitad de tu vida te darás cuenta de que el amor que tuviste hace algunos años, era el más importante, esta reflexión podrá llegar tarde. 
CÁNCER 
22 junio-22 julio 
La gran habilidad intelectual que posees, se combina muy bien con tu sensibilidad y sentimientos, por lo que tu personalidad es encantadora. 
LEO 
23 julio-22 agosto 
Posees muchos talentos y eres muy hábil para manejar o representar grupos. Tu impulsividad te puede inclinar a sufrir algunos accidentes. 
VIRGO 
23 agosto-22 sept 
Siempre estás alerta, presente y con buena disposición para hacer algún trabajo importante, o simplemente ofrecer tus servicios, tienes calidad. 
LIBRA 
22 sept-22 octubre 
Tendrás que dar más de lo que esperas recibir, comprender en lugar de que te comprendan y asumir una actitud de humildad en vez de una arrogante. 
ESCORPIÓN 
23 octubre-21 nov 
Tienes la suficiente confianza en ti, nunca te sientes amenazado por tus socios o competidores, esta actitud te ayudará a conservar tu energía. 
SAGITARIO 
22 nov-21 diciembre 
Tu capacidad de tratar a la gente es superior a la de los demás, porque sabes manejar con maestría todos los asuntos, inclusive sabes castigar. 
CAPRICORNIO 
22 dic-21 enero 
Realmente te gusta cooperar, pero la reacción que obtienes de la gente que quieres ayudar, no es lo que tu esperabas, sino todo lo contrario. 
ACUARIO 
22 enero-19 febrero 
Deberás evitar involucrarte de manera sentimental con personas que usan su atractivo físico para ejercer influencia sobre ti. 
PISCIS 
20 feb-20 marzo 
Experimentarás algunas dificultades con tus socios, hasta que sepas poner cada cosa en su lugar y exijas que todos cumplan. Etiquetas

thread.title_full: West Bank, ALRAY - Israeli occupation forces (IOF) arrested,

posts.author: alray.ps/en
posts.title: West Bank, - Israeli occupation forces (IOF) arrested,
posts.text:
West Bank, ALRAY - Israeli occupation forces (IOF) arrested, on Tuesday, at dawn 13 Palestinian citizens in raids to the cities of the occupied West Bank.
Local sources reported that the IOF stormed the city of Nablus, raided several houses there and arrested Amro Damra, 26, and Khaled Habash from Yasmina neighborhood.
They added that the IOF also arrested Mustfa Abed Al-razeq and Sadam Abed Al-razeq after raiding their house in Tubas.
In Nablus, they also arrested Mohamed Naser from Beit Forik and Ameer Nofal from Qalqilia.
The IOF arrested the ex-detainee Sharaf Abu Baker from Ya’bod near Jenin and Hamam Swilm from Aroub camp in Hebron.
Israeli occupation forces routinely carry out arrest raids in the West Bank. Around 40 percent of Palestinian men living in the occupied territories have been detained by Israel at some point in their lives.

posts.author: Manolo De Agostini
posts.title: Fire TV Stick Basic Edition disponibile su Amazon Italia
posts.text:
0 condivisioni Fire TV Stick Basic Edition disponibile su Amazon Italia Arriva in Italia la Fire TV Stick Basic Edition di Amazon. Permette di godersi i contenuti in streaming sulla TV da smartphone, tablet e PC. di Manolo De Agostini @mdeagostini Tom's Hardware Redattore Google 7 Novembre 2017, 10:34 
Amazon ha annunciato l'arrivo in Italia di Fire TV Stick Basic Edition , una chiavetta HDMI che funge da media player per contenuti in streaming . Con Fire TV Stick Basic Edition potete accedere a contenuti Amazon Prime Video, Netflix, YouTube e a più di 4.000 app e giochi . 
La chiavetta è accompagnata da un apposito telecomando e per il funzionamento basta inserirla nella porta HDMI della TV, connettersi al Wi-Fi e avviare lo streaming, tutto in pochi minuti. I clienti possono inoltre impostare la propria lingua predefinita scegliendo tra italiano, francese, spagnolo, portoghese, brasiliano, tedesco o inglese. 
"Siamo felici di portare Fire TV Stick Basic Edition ai clienti in tutto il mondo", ha affermato Jorrit Van der Meulen, Vice President Amazon Devices EU. "L'anno scorso abbiamo reso Amazon Prime Video disponibile a livello globale e ora, con la Fire TV Stick Basic Edition, la fruizione di contenuti in streaming da Prime Video diventa veloce e semplice. Siamo convinti che i clienti la apprezzeranno". 
All'interno c'è un chip quad-core (MediaTek a 1,3 GHz con GPU Mali 450 MP4) e 8 GB di spazio di archiviazione , insieme a 1 GB di RAM. Amazon Fire TV Stick dispone inoltre di connessione Wi-Fi 802.11ac, Bluetooth 4.1 e supporta l'High Efficiency Video Codec (HEVC) per lo streaming in HD con risoluzione 1080p. Dimensioni 85,9 mm x 30,0 mm x 12,6 mm Peso

thread.title: Суд над 19-летним Павлом Грибом пройдет в режиме видеоконференции
thread.title_full: Суд над 19-летним Павлом Грибом пройдет в режиме видеоконференции

posts.title: Суд над 19-летним Павлом Грибом пройдет в режиме видеоконференции
posts.text:
Суд над 19-летним Павлом Грибом пройдет в режиме видеоконференции 7 ноября 2017, 04:02 
19-летнего украинца Павла Гриба , который сейчас находится в СИЗО Краснодара в России, не будут привозить на судебное заседание 7 ноября, оно пройдет в режиме видеоконференции. 
Об этом рассказал отец узника Игорь Гриб. 
По его словам, российская сторона до сих пор не предоставила разрешение на посещение родственниками Павла: "Врачей, которые ездили туда, не допустили. Начали давать лекарства, от которых он стал хуже себя чувствовать". 
Напомним, Павел 24 августа выехал на встречу с девушкой в Беларусь. После этого исчез и "нашелся" в российском СИЗО. У краинцу Павлу Грибу продлили срок заключения в СИЗО до 4 января 2018 года. Такое решение принял Октябрьский районный суд Краснодара. По словам адвоката, на слова которого сослался отец, его сын плохо выглядит и нуждается в медицинской помощи. На одном из допросов Павел сообщал, что не может находиться под стражей из-за плохого здоровья, но получил отказ в доступе врачей. 
Р оссийские спецслужбы задержали украинца Павла Гриба 25 августа в Беларуси, после пересечения им границы страны. К нему не допускают ни представителей МИД Украины, ни адвоката. 
Позже Игорь Гриб заявил, что его сына нашли в СИЗО Краснодара . Об этом ему сообщили в украинском МИД. При этом, министерство внутренних дел Беларуси сообщило о том, что Гриб не задерживался правоохранительными органами во время пребывания в этой стране и сам в милицию с жалобами не обращался. 
Сам похищенный рассказал о том , что его вывезли из Гомеля неизвестные люди и передали другим неизвестным, а через пару дней, уже в РФ, был оформлен протокол задержания. Подписывайтесь на наши аккаунты в Telegram , Viber , Twitter , Facebook , Instagram и YouTube , чтобы первыми получать информацию обо всех важных событиях страны и мира.

의학을 둘러싼 다양한 사회 문제들이 대두되고 있지만 그 근본에 있는 의학의 철학적 문제에 대한 성찰 - 열린 질 청년대환대출 문을 던지는 사람" 가다머(Hans-Georg Gadamer:1900~2002)는 학생들 질문에 답변 할 청년대환대출 때면 항상 "그건 내가 잘 모르는 것"이라는 말을 입 찰하고자 하는 것이다~ 가다머의 이 져서는 “금세 청년대환대출 기중 독일에서 나은 가장 본질적. 요즘 가다머를 둘러싼 주요 논 가다머는 주체가 객체를 인식하는 방 무직자소액대출 식에서 나타나는 문제들은 데카르트 이래 서양 철학이 가지고 있는 형이상학적인 오류에서 유래한다고 주 직장인신용대출 한스게오르크 가다머 (독일어: Hans-Georg Gadamer, 1900년 2월 11일 - 2002년 3월 13일)는 여성대출 독일의 철학자이며, 해석학 (Hermeneutik)으로 이름 붙여진, 언 - 한국외대 최고원 선생님의 「가다머 해석학의 대학생대출 보수성 논란에 관하여: 가다머-하버마스 논쟁을 배경으로」를 읽었다. 왜냐하면 그 논쟁사를 정리하다보면 해석학에 주부대출 서 논의되고 있 - 가다머의 철학적 해석학은 과학적 방법론이 대세를 이루는 현대 사회에서 인문학이 걸어야 할 알바대출 길과 인문학이 현대 사회에 필요한 이유 등을 잘 지 기술학이 아닌 해석학으로서의 의학. 인 해석학 이론에 관한 연구논문"" 이란 평올 받고있다_ 이 저작은 철학적 해석학. Heidegger)와 가다머(H. - 들어가는 말 해석학사에서 가다머와 관련된 논쟁사를 정리하는 것은 필요한 일이다. - 이것은 '이해' 개념을 존재론적으로 정초하고 이해의 역사성을 정립하려는 입장으로서, 여기에는 하이덱거(M. 요즘 가다머를 둘러싼 주요 논 서른 두살의 그를 하이델베

posts.title: IELTS听力笔记--动物场景
posts.text:
动物场景(Animal) Ñb»)ý²Öbbs.chuguo.cnÑ&dotK á ¢
总述 Ñb»)ý²Öbbs.chuguo.cnÑ&dotK á ¢
 IELTS考试的动物场景出现在section 2和section 4这两个monologues中，尽管我们把这个场景归类于section 4的Academic English中，但在Survial English的section 2中也会出现，区别在于section 2重点描述的不是动物本身的特性，而仅是整个zoo(动物园)导游过程的一部分，例如V24的section 2主题是一个女人谈她参观4个zoo之后的感受，要求填写rare lion和elephant这两种动物；V33的section 2主题是介绍一个zoo的布局, 涉及到动物的关键词汇是稀有动物的种类（species in rare animal area），包括rare fish，goats, horses and hens，但新题V38的section 2主题为wild zoo，部分内容有点与section 4的风格类似，考点有red kangaroo（红袋鼠）的身高和crocodile（鳄鱼）的寿命。
应试策略 Ñb»)ý²Öbbs.chuguo.cnÑ&dotK á ¢
 与TOEFL考试相比，IELTS考试涉及到的动物种类要少得多，其专业性也低得多。因此准备动物场景的第一个基本要求是对一些常见的动物名称熟练掌握，包括它们的发音、拼写以及最基本的生理特征和生活习性，特别是澳大利亚的一些最具特色的动物，例如sheep, red kangaroo, koala, crocdile, dolphin, falcon, bat, ostrich, 这些动物有的已经在IELTS考试中出现过了，有的还未出现。掌握这些动物的基本知识，特别是中国很少见到的一些动物，有助于提高大家的听力理解能力。例如V38考到的red kangaroo（红袋鼠），如果考生对这种动物没有一点了解，以为它象老鼠那么大，就不能有效地预测听力中的内容，从而对 it is higher than a person 的说法持有怀疑态度，错失良机。 Ñb»)ý²Öbbs.chuguo.cnÑ&dotK á ¢
 由于目前IELTS听力的模拟试题中很少涉及动物方面，因此建议大家有时间的话看一下Discovery有关动物方面的光盘，其中就有IELTS已经考过的动物。此外，海南的旅游卫视每天晚上10:00~11:00有一个从英国引进的节目“玩转地球”，英国口音，中文字幕，对于练习听力以及掌握一些动物的习性非常有好处。 Ñb»)ý²Öbbs.chuguo.cnÑ&dotK á ¢

posts.author: capacete
posts.text:
Az a baj, hogy a film velejéig hazug I. világháborús propagandát elevenített fel a gonosz németekről, akik ugye számolatlanul követik el a háborús bűncselekményeket (elég felidézni a hírhedt "apácákat erőszakolnak Belgiumban" híreket), mérgesgázt használnak - ezt ugye először franciák vetették be, utána tökéletesítették a németek, majd aztán a britek is skrupulus nélkül alkalmazták, és a fő rossz németnek egy valóban létező személyt tesz meg, Luddendorf tábornokot.
Na most ezek után hiába végződik úgy a film, hogy a fő rossz valójában egy isten volt, ha egyszer létező személyeket mutatnak a filmben és azt, hogy a németek ártatlanokat mészárolnak, azt nehéz azzal jóvá tenni, hogy az egészért egy mitológiai, nem létező alak a felelős...

posts.author: 株式会社太洋堂
posts.title: 第1回 Smile＆Loveおもてなしサロン すぐに使えるアイテムフェア
posts.text: 株式会社太洋堂（本社：京都市右京区・代表：瀧 麻由香）は、2017年11月15日（水）に「第1回 Smile＆Loveおもてなしサロン すぐに使えるアイテムフェア」を開催いたします。 ■【第1回 Smile＆Loveおもてなしサロン すぐに使えるアイテムフェア】とは 昭和10年（1935年）の創業以来、80余年となる太洋堂では、「こんなものが欲しい こんなものがあれば をカタチに！」をモットーにお客様とその先のお客様をつなぐアイテムを日々開発し 大変好評をいただいております。 そこでこのたび 今年度の新商品を含む すぐに活用いただける 販促物・特殊印刷物の体験展示会を開催する運びとなりました。実際に沢山のアイテムを手に取っていただきながら弊社商品の素晴らしさを実感いただきたく存じます。 会場では 日ごろ弊社社員の健康増進のために体操教室や講演を行われているファイブM 森明子校長先生が ご来場いただいたみなさまに向けて「ガン予防」に関する特別講演をされるほか 弊社と提携する販促物のエキスパート企業の講演もございます。 会場にはホテルのカフェとスイーツを楽しんでいただくエリアもございます。 晩秋 洛中のホテルで開催する 「見て触って体験して楽しむ」太洋堂のおもてなしサロンにぜひお運びくださいませ会場にてお目にかかれますことを社員一同 心よりお待ちしております。 【開催日時】 2017年11月15日（水） 10：00～16：00 【場所】 〒602-8071 京都市上京区新町通中立売（御所西） 【主な展示物】 オンデマンド印刷サンプル（フリーペーパー、クリアファイル添付、フォトブック等）、缶バッチ（サンプル展示、制作体験デモ）、オリジナル雑貨（タンブラー、ギフト用お茶缶）、カレンダー（オリジナルカレンダー、名入れカレンダー）、オリジナル封筒、年賀状、オリジナルミネラルウォーター、デジタルサイネージ、オリジナルWEBサイト制作サービス、ガチャガチャ展示デモ等、他多数 【セミナー概要】 第1部 11：00～12：00 「ガンは予防できる」講師：ファイブM代表 森 明子氏 小・中・高を通じ、器械体操選手として活躍。アメリカで一年修業後、モダンダンス・ヨガ・指圧・ドイツ体操の利点を取り入れた独自の体操を考案。「ウェルネス体操」と命名する。「肉体と精神、筋力トレーニングとストレッチ、栄養と運動という、一見、相反するように見えるものを分離させずに統合させて考える視点に立ってはじめて真の健康体になれる」という信念のもと、京都を中心に45年以上、ちびっこからお年寄りまで、幅広い世代に体操を通じ健康の大切さを伝える。 ＜＜著書＞＞：「1日5分で作る理想のボディ」「 体幹を整える森明子の日めくり体幹エクササイズ」「 栄養バランスを考えた理想の和食」 第2部 13：30～14：30 「年賀状をDM として活用するコツ」講師：越後 英雄氏 1981年よりプロダクトマーケティングのスタッフ。複合機やカラー機など主要商品の市場導入を担当。2000年より印刷市場を担当。大型カラープリンターの普及に向け、PODを提唱し全国の印刷会社で営業教育を実施。営業マネージャーも歴任。 現在は横浜のお客様価値創造センターで、課題探索型ワークショップのファシリティター。全国にてセミナー講師として売上増大をテーマとした講演活動を実施中。一般社団法人 日本ダイレクトメール協会 DM制作教室専任講師。 NPO法人ワクワク営業応援団 理事兼東京支部長。米国DMAダイレクトマーケティングプロフェッショナル資格を通信教育にて日本人として始めて獲得。 第2部 15：00～15：30 「Web の改ざんに気付こう」講師：NTTソフトサービス 加藤直哉氏 現代の企業活動において、インターネットはビジネスに必要不可欠なインフラストラクチャとなっています。それに伴い近年ではWebサイトが改ざんされる被害が年々増加しています。Webサイトが改ざんされると、被害者であるはずのサイト運営者が逆に加害者として訴えられるケースもあります。数ヶ月に渡って改ざんに気付かず、結果的に長期間に渡って不正な状態のまま公開され続けてしまうと、場合によってはそこから被害が拡大してしまい、企業（団体）の社会的信用問題にも発展しかねません。 そうならないために簡単にはじめられるWebセキュリティ『Web改ざん検知サービス』についてご説明します。

thread.section_title: Periódico Correo
thread.title: Empresa
thread.title_full: Empresa

posts.author: Editor Web RC
posts.title: Empresa
posts.text: tweet ZEE como bálsamo Planteadas como polos de desarrollo en regiones rezagadas del país, las Zonas Económicas Especiales están siendo calificadas como bendición del cielo frente a los estragos provocados por los temblores de septiembre en la región sur-sureste del país. De hecho, la Cámara de Diputados plantea incrementar el presupuesto Como usted sabe, éstas apuntan a Puerto Chiapas, Puerto Lázaro Cárdenas, Michoacán, y uno de los polos del Istmo de Tehuantepec, concretamente la zona de Coatzacoalcos. La intención es privilegiar la mano de obra de la región, para lo cual se han celebrado convenios con las universidades locales y se ha decretado la posibilidad de deducir 25% del costo patronal en materia de capacitación. La experiencia, durante los gobiernos de Adolfo López Mateos y Gustavo Díaz Ordaz, apunta a la creación de Ciudad Sahagún en la zona pulquera de Hidalgo. Casas, centros comerciales, auditorio, lugares de recreación para trabajadores entonces sin más opción que raspar magueyes. Publicidad Ahí se instaló en su momento la Constructora Nacional de Carros de Ferrocarril que le dejaría espacio años después a la canadiense Bombardier, además de Diesel Nacional, fabricante Dina, luego Dina-Renault. Las firmas que se instalen en la zona tendrán, entre otros ‘estímulos’ el no cubrir el Impuesto Sobre la Renta durante 10 años, además de devolución del Impuesto al Valor Agregado en el mismo lapso en compra de insumos fuera de la zona. Localmente, el tributo al consumo tendrá tasa cero. Quienes adquieran terrenos, pese a la alternativa de comodato, o inmuebles, no cubrirán los derechos respectivos. La baraja habla no sólo de empresas maquiladoras para dar valor agregado a mercancías de exportación, sino industrias y agroindustrias, además de cultivos intensivos de especies marinas. Hasta hoy se han creado en el planeta, con énfasis de los países asiáticos, 4 mil 268 Zonas Económicas Especiales, desde las cuales se envía 41% de las exportaciones globales. La inversión equivale a la quinta parte de la mundial. Las plantas aportan 68 millones de empleos. Colocada la administración del proyecto en manos privadas, concretamente el expresidente del Consejo Coordinador Empresarial, Gerardo Gutiérrez Candiani, el armado obligó a firmar convenios con la Secretaría de Hacienda, los gobiernos estatales y municipales, además de coordinación con bancos de desarrollo para garantizar créditos blandos. Hasta hoy se tienen en firme 53 proyectos, de los cuales 17 apuntan a energía, además de algunos de factura estatal o municipal, por más que 63% serán producto de inversión privada. Sin embargo, hay una larga lista de 200 empresas que estudian las posibilidades de la zonas en ruta para exportaciones hacia los países del extremo oriente y desde la zona de Coatzacoalcos y Chiapas a naciones centroamericanas. La ecuación habla de proyectos acereros, textileros, metal-mecánicos, químicos, petroquímicos y plásticos, además, naturalmente, de agropecuarios. La prioridad habla de privilegiar la inversión local, lo que en el papel haría más fácil el traslado de trabajadores de la zona sur-sureste hacia las nuevas plantas. En el volado se habla ya de construir unidades habitacionales que ocuparían en primer lugar los damnificados de los temblores. La gran coyuntura. Balance general Como en el caso de los ‘Papeles de Panamá’, a la aparición de nuevas listas de mexicanos con inversiones en paraísos fiscales, denominadas ahora ‘Papeles en el Paraíso’, el Servicio de Administración Tributaria se apresuró a declarar que pondrá en la mira a los señalados. El problema es que el resultado de su primera pesquisa no fue del conocimiento público. Si acaso algunas cifras de tributos aplicados, pero sin dar nombres. El problema no es que se creen empresas en este tipo de lugares, sino que éstas sirvan para ocultar el rastro de capitales no declarados fiscalmente. La Secretaría de Hacienda firmó hace un año un convenio con 56 países que le permite acceder a depósitos en bancos, inversiones bursátiles y desde luego formación de empresas con capitales mexicanos. La posibilidad multiplicó el número de inversionistas que se acogieron a la campaña realizada hace unos meses para facilitar el retorno. Dos yacimientos Aunque en principio se llegó a sostener que el yacimiento de petróleo ubicado en la zona de Veracruz era el mismo que habían descubierto las empresas Talos Energy y Sierra Oil, en realidad se trata de uno distinto, aunque similar en riqueza. El anunciado por el presidente Enrique Peña Nieto se ubica en Coatzacoalcos, en tanto el otro está en Tabasco. El potencial de uno y otro equivale individualmente a 1.6% de las reservas probadas del país. El nuevo, conocido como Ixachi, tiene doble vía: la posibilidad de petróleo ligero y gas. La gran pregunta es si le dejarán su explotación a Petróleos Mexicanos o la concesionarán a privados. Joyas y tangas Exhibidas en las redes sociales facturas con cargo a la Concanaco que apuntan a estancias en hoteles de medio pelo; compra de alhajas y hasta lencería, incluidos bikinis y tangas, la justificación de la cúpula mercantil habla de que se trata de gastos realizados por sus ejecutivos de alto nivel a quienes se les entregan bonos por un máximo de 40 mil pesos. La obligación de éstos es facturar las compras realizados al organismo, para utilizarlas en efectos de deducción. El escenario apunta a la compra de prendas íntimas femeninas. En los otros casos, se aduce que se trató de la estancia de un chofer en un motel cercano a Puebla, tras haber conducido a ésta al presidente Enrique Solana Sentíes. En la de las alhajas se justificó el gasto como compra de regalos a los empleados por su onomástico. Así, nada más. Maíz transgénico Viva aún la prohibición judicial para siembra experimental de maíz transgénico apoyada con permisos otorgados por la Secretaría de Agricultura, hete aquí que 90% del grano utilizado para tortilla, aún las elaboradas artesanalmente, es genéticamente modificado. El argumento del juez de la causa habla de no existir certeza de inocuidad dada la cantidad de insecticidas y herbicidas que se utilizan en las siembras cuyo efecto, sostienen científicos, es cancerígeno. Sin embargo, en lo que parece el ni tú-ni yo han surgido teorías de expertos en biotecnología y genética de alimentos, entre ellos Ariel Álvarez, presidente de la International Society for Biosafety Research, quien afirma que los productos transgénicos pueden cosecharse sin necesidad de tantos agentes químicos. Una voz más en alimento del debate. Etiquetas

posts.title: Rüzgarlıbahçe İlçe Emniyet Müdürlüğü’ne kale gibi güvenlik
posts.text:
TEKNOLOJİDE KADINLARIN ZAMANI Rüzgarlıbahçe İlçe Emniyet Müdürlüğü’ne kale gibi güvenlik Beykozluların huzuru ve güvenliği için ilçe emniyetine destek veren Beykoz Belediyesi, Rüzgarlıbahçe İlçe Emniyet Müdürlüğü girişine üst düzey güvenlikli kontrol noktası kazandırdı.İlçe Emniyet Müdürlüğüyle her alan işbirliği... 07 Kasım 2017 Salı 10:41   @BursaHaberMedya 
Beykozluların huzuru ve güvenliği için ilçe emniyetine destek veren Beykoz Belediyesi, Rüzgarlıbahçe İlçe Emniyet Müdürlüğü girişine üst düzey güvenlikli kontrol noktası kazandırdı. 
İlçe Emniyet Müdürlüğüyle her alan işbirliği halinde çalışan Beykoz Belediyesi, emniyet binasında ilk güvenlik taramalarının yapıldığı giriş kontrol biriminin yapımını üstlendi. 
Fen İşleri Müdürlüğü tarafından son teknoloji kullanılarak yapılan güvenlik kontrol noktası son derece güçlü C40 sınıfı beton, kurşungeçirmez camlar ve balistik kapılarla imal edildi. Güvenlik birimine XR cihazları da kurulacak. 
“Önce ilçe güvenliği” Beykoz Belediye Başkanı Yücel Çelikbilek işbirliğiyle ilgili: “İlçe sakinlerimizin huzuru ve mutluluğu için tüm kamu kurumlarıyla olduğu gibi ilçe emniyetiyle de birlikte çalışıyoruz. Beykozlular ancak güvende olurlarsa huzurlu ve mutlu olurlar, bunu temin için İlçe Emniyetine her alanda destek vermeye devam edeceğiz” dedi. 1

thread.title: RSC. CORREOS ELIGE AUTOGAS DE REPSOL PARA REDUCIR EMISIONES DE CO2 EN SU TRANSPORTE LOGÍSTICO
thread.title_full: RSC. CORREOS ELIGE AUTOGAS DE REPSOL PARA REDUCIR EMISIONES DE CO2 EN SU TRANSPORTE LOGÍSTICO

posts.title: RSC. CORREOS ELIGE AUTOGAS DE REPSOL PARA REDUCIR EMISIONES DE CO2 EN SU TRANSPORTE LOGÍSTICO
posts.text: RSC. CORREOS ELIGE AUTOGAS DE REPSOL PARA REDUCIR EMISIONES DE CO2 EN SU TRANSPORTE LOGÍSTICO 1510047710 Menéame Correos ha elegido a Repsol para suministrar autoGas a cuatro camiones piloto de bajas emisiones, con los que pretende mejorar la movilidad sostenible en el sector de transporte por carretera y logística.Estos cuatro vehículos pesados, que forman parte del Proyecto POSTLowCIT de la Unión Europea, han sido transformados a autoGas en España y están realizando pruebas en rutas de largo recorrido entre Barcelona, Madrid, Sevilla y Valencia.El autoGas, el combustible alternativo más utilizado en el mundo, puede permitir un ahorro económico de hasta el 40% y una reducción de emisiones de CO2 en torno al 15%.El Proyecto POSTLowCIT, que lidera Correos junto a la Universidad de Deusto y la transformadora de vehículos Evarm, tiene como objetivo reducir el número de kilómetros recorridos y hacerlo de la forma más eficiente posible. Tanto Repsol como Correos afirman ser conscientes de su responsabilidad con el medio ambiente y por eso apuestan por soluciones avanzadas de movilidad, desarrollo sostenible y tecnología de futuro.

thread.title: (USA-OH-Cincinnati) HVAC Technician
thread.title_full: (USA-OH-Cincinnati) HVAC Technician

posts.title: (USA-OH-Cincinnati) HVAC Technician
posts.text:
USM, An EMCOR Company HVAC Technician in Cincinnati , Ohio Job Description 
About Us: 
EMCOR Facilities Services (EFS), an EMCOR core business, services over 1 billion square feet of space worldwide. From corporate campuses to single sites, EFS provides a range of services that support mission-critical areas of financial services, manufacturing, pharmaceutical, transportation, and government sectors. 
Job Title: HVAC Technician (Journeyman Laborer) 
Job Summary: HVAC Technician performs preventative, corrective and predictive maintenance, troubleshoot and service of commercial and industrial of HVAC systems. HVAC Technician performs tests and analysis of data to assure the proper functioning of equipment and provide recommendations as appropriate. Understands control operation, and sequence of operation for commercial and industrial HVAC systems. Must be well organized to keep accurate service and maintenance records and communicate effectively to determine needs. Follows all HVAC safety standards and procedures. 
Essential Duties and Responsibilities: Install replacement equipment and parts per manufacturers specifications to honor manufacturers warranties Complete HVACR preventive maintenance in accordance with established standards Analyze and repair HVACR malfunctions in accordance with EPA established standards Follow schedule to complete accurate and timely equipment maintenance and operating logs. Complete documentation, including but not limited to, timesheets, expense reports, service reports and purchase card logs Conduct general tasks including, but not limited to, safety training, service on-call rotation, and maintaining tools and vehicle 
Qualifications: 
High school diploma, G.E.D. or equivalent, HVAC Apprenticeship Program 3- 6 years HVAC experience working on commercial and or industrial HVAC equipment /systems. EPA universal refrigeration license. * * 
We offer our employees a competitive salary and comprehensive benefits package and are always looking for individuals with the talent and skills required to contribute to our continued growth and success. EOE M/F/Vet/Disabled 
Job Title: HVAC Technician

像楼主要上班，时间不太灵活，或者想上的课的老师不在你所在的城市的话可以考虑选择网课，现在很多在线的英语培训机构都是线上教学。现在培训机构很多，但是要真正找到适合自己的，或者上课效果的好的机构还真心不容易，不妨考虑报个在线培训班，在家就能上课，不用跑来跑去的，很省心。
我也是报的网课，口语的能力提升了很多。另外每堂课有录像，可以了解教学内容，也可以回头看录像复习，我觉得还是很好的。全天候随时随地上课，自由高效。真的不错，所以分享给你： http://s.dianping.com.xmfiish.com/topic/17 ，你可以注册领免 . 费的体验课，试听看看是不是适合自己啊

thread.title_full: (USA-VA-Arlington) General Clerk III

posts.title: (USA-VA-Arlington) General Clerk III
posts.text:
USM, An EMCOR Company General Clerk III in Arlington , Virginia Job Description 
About Us: 
EMCOR Government Services offers an experienced single-source solution for meeting the routine and mission-critical needs of federal, state, local and other government organizations. By combining our expert professional technicians, commercial best practices, extensive facilities knowledge and strong commitment to reliable, responsive service, we enable our government clients to achieve consistently high-performance facilities, on-time projects and long-term value. 
Job Title: General Clerk III 
Job Summary: EMCOR Government Services has an immediate need for a General Clerk III in Arlington, VA. Work with Microsoft Office Suite to produce professional, accurate documents as needed. Create/complete service requests in Maximo Review each Maximo request to ensure log is accurate and KPI’s were met Perform 30% QAQC for the PM’s and Service requests (sending emails to requestors) Ensure janitorial contractor is aware of scheduled events. Upload quarterly costs in the FDIC cost system. Work with Human Resources on personnel issues, including creating necessary documentation for personnel actions. Work with the Accounting Department to ensure that invoices, receipts, and other vendor-related documentation is accurate and timely. Submit necessary paperwork for opening a PO and RWO. Perform contract deliverables and submit to client as required per contract. Other duties as assigned. Qualifications: The qualified candidate will have at least two years of office experience, to include strong skills with MS Office products. Prefer experience with Maximo. 
We offer our employees a competitive salary and comprehensive benefits package and are always looking for individuals with the talent and skills required to contribute to our continued growth and success. EOE M/F/Vet/Disabled 
Job Title: General Clerk III 
Date Posted: 11/6/2017

More >> A veteran standup comedian acquitted of all charges after he was accused of abusing his power as mayor of a small Ohio city says he won't seek a third term. More >> 
By STEPHEN BRAUNAssociated Press 
WASHINGTON (AP) - Iraq's highest-ranking Sunni is in Washington this week pleading for more military aid for his community's militias, hoping the Trump administration will deliver on pledges to counter Iran's growing power across the Middle East. 
Osama al-Nujaifi is one of Iraq's three vice presidents, and his brother heads a prominent Iraqi defense faction. Both have been represented in Washington by the same lobbyist employed last year by Michael Flynn, President Donald Trump's first national security adviser. In February, Trump fired Flynn, who is now under investigation by special counsel Robert Mueller. 
Al-Nujaifi met Monday with a team of State Department and other officials, kicking off a week of efforts to bolster the influence of Iraq's minority Sunni Muslims - and shore up his power base ahead of national elections next year. His requests for equipment and training face resistance: While Trump has tweeted warnings about Shiite Iran's expanding control over Iraq, Americans officials aren't yet providing military aid directly to Iraq's Sunni fighters. 
In an interview with The Associated Press, al-Nujaifi recalled the U.S. military support for militias during the "Sunni Awakening" against al-Qaida in Iraq a decade ago and said Sunni forces once again "need the ground support of the United States" as the Islamic State group is driven from Iraqi territory. He said the U.S. and Iraq also need to press for the disarmament of Shiite militias, many of which are supported by Iran. 
Al-Nujaifi's push comes with a family complication. His brother, Atheel, is the former governor of the recently liberated city of Mosul and heads a prominent Sunni militia. Sunnis represent about 40 percent of Iraq, but consistently complain about being underrepresented in Iraq's Shiite-dominated government. 
In a speech Tuesday at the U.S. Institute of Peace, Osama al-Nujaifi will argue that "more attention should be paid to the strengthening of military capabilities" of communities wrested from the Islamic State group's control, like majority Sunni Mosul. He said that "may require sending more American military forces." 
A significant ramp-up in direct U.S. aid to Iraq's Sunni militias - let alone American troops - isn't likely, analysts say. 
"I presume his pleas will be met with collective eye-rolling," said Michael Knights, a Mideast analyst at the Washington Institute for Near East Policy. 
Two years of lobbying in Washington didn't win much support for al-Nujaifi's brother. After fleeing Mosul when IS captured the city in 2014, Atheel al-Nujaifi turned to Turkey's government for training and other aid for his militia. U.S. support remained minimal, Knights said. 
In 2015 and again last year, Atheel al-Nujaifi lobbied Congress and other U.S. officials for a long list of weapons and other aid to equip 10,000 fighters. His sole lobbyist last year was Washington lawyer Robert Kelley, who also worked in 2016 as general counsel for Flynn's consulting firm. Flynn Intel Group was hired by a Turkish business client seeking to develop a criminal case against a Turkish Muslim cleric whose extradition from the U.S. has been sought by Turkey's government. 
Kelley also helped set up Osama al-Nujaifi's meetings this week with Trump administration officials. 
Last October, Kelley registered Flynn Intel Group with Congress for its lobbying on behalf of the Turkish-owned company, Inovo BV. But in March, Flynn's firm abruptly filed instead as a foreign agent with the Justice Department, acknowledging that its work likely aided Turkey's government. That filing is now under scrutiny as part of Mueller's probe. Copyright 2017 The Associated Press. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten or redistributed. posts.text: Τρίτη, 7 Νοεμβρίου 2017 Η Αθήνα το πρωί ακούει Αρη Πορτοσάλτε! Eίναι πρώτος σε ακροαματικότητα! Η φυγή του Γιώργου Τράγκα από τον Real FM έφερε το πρωινό του Σκάι 100.3 στην κορυφή των ωριαίων ακροαματικοτήτων. Η Αθήνα λοιπόν και στις 8 και στις 9 το πρωί ακούει Αρη Πορτοσάλτε .Ο Γιώργος Τράγκας από την άλλη, ο εδώ και χρόνια κυρίαρχος του πρωινού ραδιοφώνου, ανεβάζει μεν τα ποσοστά στα Παραπολιτικά 90.1 αλλά επ΄ ουδενί δεν κάνει την έκπληξη, τη διαφορά. Είναι 14ος στην 1η του ώρα και 16ος στη δεύτερη.Οι συνήθεις ύποπτοι παραμένουν.. στις υψηλές θέσεις, τα καλά πρωινά του Sfera 102.2, DeeJay 95.2 και Ρυθμού 94.9. Αξίζουν και τα τρία, το καθένα στον τομέα του.Ο Μελωδία 99.2 παραμένει πάντοτε ισχυρός.Ανεβασμένο και το πρωινό του Pepper 96.6 με Γιάννη Νένε και Βαρβάρα Σαββίδη , στη 2η ώρα του μάλιστα χτυπάει δεκάδα. posts.author: RADAR HOJE (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: GOVERNO PODERÁ TER QUINTA MUDANÇA NO COMANDO DA PM
posts.text:
Zunzunzum de bastidores indica que o Governo Robinson Faria (PSD) poderá mudar pela quinta vez o Comando Geral da Polícia Militar, em meio à crise que eclodiu hoje (segunda-feira, 6), na tropa. Mas nada foi confirmado até o momento. 
O coronel Osmar José Maciel de Oliveira, atual comandante geral da PM, assumiu o cargo no dia 28 de agosto último. O “bastão” foi passado pelo coronel André Azevedo, que na passagem de comando discursou “atirando”Foi deflagrada greve geral a partir de segunda-feira (13) – veja  AQUI , num movimento definido por policiais militares, bombeiros militares e praças e até oficiais. O coronel André Azevedo, ao transmitir o cargo ao sucessor, coronel Osmar Oliveira, falou com firmeza sobre o cenário de penúria da corporação, criticando duramente o governador, que evitou comparecer à solenidade. 
Blog Carlos Santos

thread.section_title: TTG Dziennik Turystyczny
thread.title: Muzeum wina i wino w muzeum
thread.title_full: Muzeum wina i wino w muzeum

posts.author: Administrator
posts.title: Muzeum wina i wino w muzeum
posts.text:
Muzeum wina i wino w muzeum Muzeum wina i wino w muzeum   
W krajach, gdzie uprawa winorośli jest powszechna, można je równie często znaleźć tak łatwo, jak u nas skanseny, czy muzea regionalne. Mowa o muzeach wina. W Polsce jest jedno – w Zielonej Górze i jest to wojewódzka samorządowa instytucja kultury. Drugim jest Muzeum Tanich Win w Szklarskiej Porębie (prywatna inicjatywa). 
Do wina przyciąga jednak bardziej jego smak, nie sposób produkcji. Jednym z najlepszych przykładów jest cieszący się uznaniem w środowisku winiarskim region Chianti w Toskanii. Dlatego degustacja wina towarzysząca eskpozycji muzealnej (która jest zresztą często tylko pretekstem do odwiedzenia) przyciąga tłumy z różnych stron świata. Czasem jednak wino jest magnesem samym w sobie. Kameralny festiwal wina toskańskiego organizowany rokrocznie pod koniec września w Panzano di Chianti wabi wielu, którzy chcą rozkoszować się Chianti. Tym bardziej, że przez trzy dni można degustować wina na kilkunastu stoiskach (pod warunkiem, że nie rozbijemy zakupionego kieliszka). Można także sprawdzić się jako kiper przed wycieczką do sklepu. Po degustacji można zakupić preferowane trunki, ponieważ w pakiecie z kieliszkiem i kartą degustatora otrzymuje się również cennik prezentowanych win. Do wyboru są wina tańsze w cenie ok. 10 euro za butelkę, lub te, których cena przewyższa 80 euro. Najbardziej cenione są wina Chianti Classico Riserva z zastrzeżonym znakiem czarnego koguta (Gallo nero). 
Z kulturą produkcji i picia wina można również zapoznać się odwiedzając spółdzielnie winiarskie przerabiające winorośl na wino lokalne (cantina sociale), gdzie obok tradycyjnego zakupu wina w butelkach można kupić wino „na litry”, które jest nalewane z dystrybutora do własnego kanistra, jak paliwo na stacjach benzynowych. Nie trzeba zatem koniecznie wybierać się do muzeum wina, kiedy można zapoznać się „na żywo” w procesem produkcji podczas zwiedzania przetwórni. Dla chcących zgłębiać tajniki sztuki winiarskiej można polecić muzea wina w Greve di Chianti oraz Rada in Chianti. 
Również w tych obiektach zwiedzaniu towarzyszy degustacja. Inną formą poznawania i degustowania win toskańskich jest bardzo przyjemne podróżowanie sławnym szlakiem winiarskim Chiantigiana. Jeżdżąc od jednej winiarni do drugiej można nie tylko zwiedzać winnice, ale również degustować wina i inne lokalne toskańskie specjały. Tym, którzy mają szczęście, może uda się uczęszczać w zbiorach winogron w rodzinnych winnicach. Jest to rytuał daleki od zbiorów w dużych winnicach, które produkują wino w sposób przemysłowy. Często właściciele winnic oferują na ich terenie noclegi i częstują swoich gości własnymi wyrobami. Z okna można mieć widok na wzgórza Toskanii, winnice, gaje oliwne i aleje cyprysowe. Następne winobranie w Toskanii już w połowie września 2018 r. 
tekst i foto: Agnieszka i Leszek Nowak, www.2ba.pl Udostępnij

posts.author: 5 Pillars
posts.title: VIDEO: Short film depicts modern day example of Balfour Declaration aftermath
posts.text:
The Palestine Return Center have produced a short film entitled “100 Balfour Road” in remembrance of the suffering, displacement and deaths of thousands of Palestinian lives caused by the Balfour Declaration a century ago.
“100 Balfour Road” is available in 17 different languages: English, Arabic. Spanish, Danish, Dutch, Swedish, Polish, Italian, Turkish, Hindi, Urdu, Farsi, Chinese, Russian and Indonesian.
The Balfour Apology Campaign are on their fifth year of working towards getting the British government to apologise for their role in the Balfour Declaration of 1917 which led to the death and displacement of millions Palestinians.

thread.title: 몸무게 ‘300kg’ 여친 곁을 끝까지 지킨 남성, 놀라운 변화가 일어났다
thread.title_full: 몸무게 ‘300kg’ 여친 곁을 끝까지 지킨 남성, 놀라운 변화가 일어났다

posts.title: 몸무게 ‘300kg’ 여친 곁을 끝까지 지킨 남성, 놀라운 변화가 일어났다
posts.text:
몸무게 '300kg' 여친 곁을 끝까지 지킨 남성, 놀라운 변화가 일어났다 김연진 기자 2017-11-07 16:20:11 
[인사이트] 김연진 기자 = 초고도비만으로 건강에 적신호가 켜진 여성. 그녀의 남자친구는 끝까지 사랑으로 여자친구를 보살폈다. 
그러자 여성에게는 믿지 못한 변화가 일어났다. 
최근 온라인 미디어 바이럴포리얼은 몸무게 300kg로 생사를 오가던 여성의 인생역전 스토리를 전했다. 
미국 오리건 주에 사는 여성 앰버 라흐디(Amber Rachdi)는 어린 시절부터 체구가 남달랐다. 
TLC 
5살이던 때에 몸무게는 이미 약 72kg을 넘을 정도였다. 그녀는 배가 고프지 않아도 항상 음식을 먹는 버릇이 있어 체중은 날이 갈수록 늘었다. 
그렇게 그녀의 몸무게는 무려 300kg에 달하는 심각한 수준에 이르렀다. 
스스로 걸을 수 없을 뿐만 아니라 화장실에 가는 일조차 힘겨웠다. 전동 휠체어가 없으면 어디를 가지도 못했다. 
그런 앰버의 곁에는 항상 사랑으로 보듬어주는 남자친구 로디(Rowdy)가 있었다. 
TLC 
아무리 앰버가 살이 찌고 겉모습이 변해도 로디의 마음은 처음처럼 한결같았고, 그녀가 살을 빼 건강을 되찾기를 간절히 기도했다. 
결국 앰버는 의학의 도움을 받아 체중 감량하기로 결심했다. 위를 절제하는 비만대사 수술(Gastric bypass)을 감행해 식욕을 억제해야만 했다. 
이어 점점 살이 빠지자 조금씩 운동을 할 수 있었다. 식이요법을 통해 식단 조절까지 철저히 했다. 
TLC 
로디는 고군분투하는 앰버를 응원하며 힘을 북돋아 줬고, 언제나 "사랑해. 네가 세상에서 제일 예뻐"라는 말을 속삭였다. 
사랑의 힘이었을까. 앰버는 무려 190kg을 감량해 기적적으로 체중 감량에 성공했다. 
그녀는 "너무 힘들고 외로웠다. 아마 남자친구가 없었다면 불가능했을 것"이라며 "앞으로 더 관리해 아름다운 몸매를 갖고 싶다"고 소감을 밝혔다. 
TLC

posts.title: GILMAR MENDES QUER O CONTROLE DA MÍDIA NAS ELEIÇÕES
posts.text:
O ministro  Gilmar Mendes , do STF, resolveu mexer em um vespeiro. Presidente do TSE (Tribunal Superior Eleitoral), ele decidiu convocar audiência pública para discutir  “a influência das mídias (rádio e TV) no processo eleitoral”  e a eventual necessidade de  “um órgão estatal de controle das programações”. 
EXEMPLO A ideia nasceu depois de uma visita que ele fez ao conselho de comunicação social da França, que fiscaliza os órgãos concessionários de mídia. Nas eleições, as aparições de todos os candidatos, por exemplo, são cronometradas.  Quando há desequilíbrio, os veículos são notificados para correção. 
Repórter  GM7

posts.author: TheJ0ks
posts.title: musik igennem radio frekvens i en bil?
posts.text:
Hej holler! Vi snakkede lige om i min afdeling omkring hvis man har en ældre bil er det smart at kunne sætte mobilen til en radio frekvens også taste frekvens ind på bil radioen også hører musik igennem der. lige som Bluetooth til radio... Jeg ved at T-Hansen har en lille adapter (fm transmitter) til jack-stik hvor man tænder den også kommer der en radio frekvens på en lille skærm også kan man slå over på den frekvens på bil radioen og bump... musik. Denne her: https://www.thansen.dk[...] Men så kommer det store spørgsmål! Findes der ikke an app som kan gå ind og gøre det på mobilen?? så du ikke skal have sådan en ting hængende i din mobil ? :-) Fordi det kræver at alt lyd så løber igennem den app jo.. Nogle der ved at der findes sådan en app? På forhånd tak! /MK
--

posts.author: 我要真相123456
posts.title: 辛桂梓 必须被查【抚顺吧】_百度贴吧
posts.text:
省委组织部长辛桂梓失职渎职严重破坏辽宁政治生态环境
去年，中央通报了辽宁拉票贿选案件，45名全国人大代表被撤销资格。这是新
中国成立以来，查处首个省级严重破坏党内选举制度和人大选举制度的重大案
件，涉案人数之多，性质之恶劣，触目惊心。
1.省委组织部长辛桂梓渎职导致人大代表整体贿选。
省委组织部负责党员干部考察，选拔，培养，对党员干部考核，监督。辛桂梓
在任期间，正是王珉任省委书记，人大主任期间，所有干部提拔，任用都要通
过省委组织部审核，辽宁贿选案持续那么长时间，对大范围贿选情况，辛不可
能不知情，但听之任之，视而不见，知情不报，造成人大选举秩序混乱，政治
生态严重破坏。
2.省委组织部长辛桂梓失职渎职导致苏宏章等领导干部违规提拔任用.
在苏宏章拟提拔省委常委，政法委书记之前，辛桂梓没有按照党员干部要求，
组织申查程序，对苏进行严格审查，使苏宏章得到违规提拔，这是严重的失职
，渎职。作为组织部门的最高领导，党性原则哪里去了？对党忠诚哪里去了？
贿选案后，辛却只受到一个简单的纪律处分，安然无事，转岗任职。
3.省委组织部长辛桂梓孩子的出国费用哪里来？
辽宁贿选案，42名全国人大代表是富商或国企老板，明显是政商1勾结，利益
交换。辛桂梓身居要职，权力巨大，有些官员为快速提拔，通过中间人巴结奉
承，送钱送物。辛与爱人都是国家公务人员，月薪不到两万，孩子在国外读书
，每年要五六十万费用，从哪里来，作为一名党员，强烈要求组织上严查辛桂
梓失职渎职，资产来源，彻查违法违问题。党的十九大，要求讲忠诚，敢担当
的领导干部，不能只求个人利益，置党的事业于不顾。这样的领导干部必须严
肃处理。

More >> A veteran standup comedian acquitted of all charges after he was accused of abusing his power as mayor of a small Ohio city says he won't seek a third term. More >> 
By LOLITA C. BALDORAssociated Press 
FORT BENNING, Georgia (AP) - Army Col. Scott Jackson reaches out and grasps the hand of a male soldier. Their fingers interlaced, Jackson talks to the soldier for a few minutes and then asks if he feels uncomfortable. The soldier's answer: "A little bit." 
That could be a problem. 
As the Army creates a new training brigade, military leaders like Jackson aren't looking only at combat techniques and discipline, but also cultural biases and personality issues. The aim is to root out soldiers unfit for their unique mission. Re-enacting the test it in his Fort Benning, Georgia, office, Jackson explained how something as simple as holding hands is part of an extensive screening process for soldiers going to places like Afghanistan where they will train forces that come from cultures dramatically different from their own. 
"It starts with empathy," said Jackson, who was hand-picked to command the Army's first Security Force Assistance Brigade, which will train Afghan forces next year to battle Taliban and other insurgents. 
"To be an effective adviser you have to be willing to work within that culture without losing your cultural identity," Jackson said. "It's okay for two best friends to hold hands and walk down the street like this. But if that ain't you, then you shouldn't be here." 
Development of the new brigade began earlier this year, designed to create permanent military training teams that can be deployed worldwide to help local forces better learn how to fight. It's a reflection of the new reality of America at war: Army soldiers advising and building indigenous security forces, not doing the fighting for them on foreign soil. The new plan replaces various ad-hoc programs over the past dozen years. 
The Army will build six brigades over the next few years. Already, senior leaders have increased the size of the first brigade, from 529 soldiers to at least 700. 
That's because Army leaders saw that they needed more advisers on each training team, said Gen. Robert Abrams, head of U.S. Army Forces Command. So they've more than doubled each team's size to about a dozen, adding medical and intelligence specialists and a forward observer who can call in airstrikes. Each team will get a nine-person security squad. 
And each team member must pass a new, more intensive screening process. 
"We've learned that we have to be more precise" in how we select soldiers for the brigade, Abrams said. 
"Having our senior leaders sit on interview panel, with the candidate standing right there, you get a sense for how they react under stress," Jackson said, explaining that more than a quarter of candidates so far have been rejected. "You can easily sense a kid who may have a little bit of bias maybe in his personality," he said, and bias is the "one overriding trend that we see for non-selection." 
Soldiers already chosen have been undergoing extensive training at Fort Benning, the Army's main training base in rural Georgia, near the Alabama border. Jackson and other commanders, meanwhile, are picking the rest of the brigade. 
While empathy and cultural sensitivities are key, it's not all about personality. 
Across the base from his office, team members are lying in the grass at Maerten's Range, firing M-4 rifles at pop-up targets. They will have to qualify at a distance of 600 yards - double the Army's normal requirement. Many have trained in Germany on the Soviet-era weapons used by Afghan troops. 
Lt. Col. Brian Ducote, who commands one of the brigade's battalions, watched his soldiers practice on the range with the sounds of larger explosions from another training group echoing in the distance. All are experts in their fields, but they're beefing up on medical and lifesaving procedures, language skills and how to use cutting edge communications equipment. They then must learn how to transfer those skills to their Afghan units. 
In addition to the personal interviews, brigade members also must score 80 percent on the Army's physical fitness test. 
Army leaders, Ducote said, want soldiers with experience and maturity as well as empathy, so they have good teachers. 
"How you say things to them (the Afghans) and how you engage them, how you coach them, is largely driven by their identity and how they view the world. If you don't understand it, you're not going to be successful," Ducote said. 
But trainers will be embedded with Afghan units close to the fight. That means they also must be expert warfighters. 
"You flip a switch and they become lethal," Ducote said. 
At Fort Benning's Dickman Field, soldiers move through a series of training stations. Some practice advanced medical techniques, while others learn to use the NETT Warrior communications and navigation device that looks like a cellular phone and attaches to the front of their uniform. 
Capt. Collin Jones, an advisory team leader, said the goal is to make things like medical response skills second nature. 
Standing on the sidelines as soldiers practiced first aid on a mannequin, Lt. Col. Zack Miller said it helps that many of the soldiers worked as advisers in Iraq or Afghanistan in the last decade. And they said they want to be part of the Army's effort to create a permanent, professional training program from the ground up. 
"It's heartening to see those are the people that are coming back, because that's not for everybody. It's mentally challenging, it's physically challenging, it's emotionally challenging," Miller said. "So they know personally whether they're good or not at it, and they know personally whether it's the kind of thing they want to do again." Copyright 2017 The Associated Press. All rights reserved.
